key_risks: Financial performance concerns with reported losses and declining sales in key markets
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and geopolitical tensions
Intense competition from local retailers and e-commerce giants
Regulatory and labor risks including evolving trade policies and labor disputes
Pandemic aftermath impacting consumer behavior and foot traffic
controversies: Labor disputes and workforce morale issues in certain regions
Persistent losses from associates raising profitability concerns
environmental_issues: Commitment to sustainability initiatives including waste reduction and energy efficiency
social_issues: Labor disputes and workforce morale issues
Impact of COVID-19 on employee health and safety
governance_issues: Regulatory risks from evolving trade policies and environmental regulations
